body:
You know... it's not that I'm against them getting back together... people deserve another chance and there was blackmail involved.... 

But f***.... there is something wrong with these hentai.... why can't women just tell the past??? Why is telling the past worse than cheating??? If they don't want you with your past... then you shouldn't force them....
Dude so fucking delusional. I would have done DNA test and only took her back if the kids were mine and only for the kids.

I was with it all the way until he took her back.... those are NOT his kids. So he's going to spend ALL of that money raising some other guy's kids despite the millions of other women in Japan that he could choose from??? Looks like the author was REALLY determined to write that ending, despite how little sense it makes.
Damn I need to go out and touch some grass maybe hunt and kill scum like him as well 12 years is too short how bout a whole damnation via being nailed on a cross
12 years in prison? they should've killed the dude. after 12 years, he'd be fucking the wife again.
what a dumbass, almost a good ending.
it was ALMOST good until the idiot mc decides to get back with her. he should of just fucked her one last time then bounced
fucken amazing
Yea, she's retarded beyond help.. and storyline sucks.. this thing also happens irl and they're all retarded as well

I think it would have been better for them to go separate ways. Like she was happily cheating at times. That’s an issue. Their entire relationship is also a lie. It’s not like just one mistake. I’ll just imagine they go their separate ways after the court and talk in the restaurant.

@torajiro the slow cow After they divorced, he was still trying to talk himself into believing that it was the right choice. He never really stopped loving her and still cared about the kids, which is why he told Chima that he wouldn't change anything when she brought it up because then the kids wouldn't exist.
im lil confused here, so what's happened with the ending? did the husband left her for good and wishes her to be happy? or is he goes back to loving her once again??

I like that the NTR guy's videos were actually used to get justice in this. Needs to happen more, honestly. As far as Tadashi marrying Chima again, while I don't like it necessarily, I kinda understand it even though I wouldn't have done it personally.

Chima is a real bitch... She's not a victim at all... Maybe of the assault by the dudes she didn't know but that's about it.
She decided to cheat and continue to do it as well. Wouldn't it have been better to just put it out on the open at some point before getting married.

College is what 3 to 4 years? Plus one the kids age, maybe 2 years old since he couldn't speak yet. That's 5 years cheating minimum.

There was no love here on chima's side. She is an evil bitch. A more realistic ending would have been the dude been a good guy and helping getting the guy arrested but never returning to her.
She can't be trusted. Not only that the videos of her yelling out all that shit degrading him. Fucking sucks. 
The guy is just going to suffer forever, every time he sees the kids or has sex with her he will be reminded of it. 
On that panel in the train, it's already near the end after he remarried her, he is having doubts he did the right thing. Poor guy.
Her name is a lego brand

The MC almost got in the chad tier for jailing the other dude but he backpedaled and went simping instead, goddamit. The story is nice tho, its very unlikely that we got any NTR story that actually shows any people getting consequences for their actions. This is a rare find indeed.
Woulda been better if he had gone crazy and killed chica the rapist and the children and it would have been his court case for murder much Better story instead of this lovydovy bullshit
What a fool

What is sad is that in real world the guy would have been legal father of the kids even after he found out that both were not his and he would be paying child support until both are 18. At least such is the law in my country (yes indeed it sucks for the cuck).
Story is great but art is shit
I'm not even fapping. My boy is limp from the art. The ntr setting kinda good. But I'm just reading for the plot. Overall 4/10. I mean, our mc still a simp... Foolish.
Nice guy for raising the kids, a crown for the cuck king.

Once a cheater, always a cheater.

Also, screw captcha.
In the end he’s still a fool.

Welp, He did the right thing for divorving her!!! and the Cheating bastard got 12 years of jail!!! IF He still loves and acept hers, well it is his choice!!! But i would have left and search a new lover!!
Snitched on that nigga and got him locked up for 12 years for chasing a bag?! Tragic
Just advice for all of you.... This is fucking manga so why you so serious...the ending is happy so that's it....

Honestly she should had known ppl were running a train on her geez look at that line bruh all shapes and sizes she cant tell? And both kids not his which was worst. First kid she did not know and second she did, after knowing the soul train been throught that i would not went back so props to him, some women learn from mistakes but dam....soul train be in my head when we have sex lol
I knew it...  That from the style of drawing itself the ntr would involve feelings... Now mc is simp and my dick is limp.

Also, how many years of cheating was that? 2 years in college maybe, 2 while they were married. What's the point of keeping a relationship like that going? The story was pretty good though, wish they would have some better dialogue when he (the husband) exposed her. Felt like the author got lazy on that part.
Them getting back together also made no sense, be real man after all that shit he heard her say when having sex with the other dude how can he ever trust her.
If some dudes seduces her again, she will cheat again. Once a cheater, always a cheater.

It was a relationship that was a lie from the beginning. She was never forced, on the contrary she liked it. Poor guy is too nice for his own good.
It's funny, what's worse, having your husband or wife find out you cheated once or have them find out you've cheated the whole relationship and that both your children probably aren't yours to begin with. What a dumbass.
At least the bad guy went to jail.
its NTR but with a happy end <3
Finally someone that uses all the videos the dumb asshat sends to the mc and got what was coming to him.
Well, at least the main asshat in this serie got what they deserve.

Marrying her again though? She lied so much to him that he can never realistically trust her. Yeah she's got money now but is it that much? Her snatch can't be that good anymore after three kids and the dozens of dicks that have gone through it. Are any of the kids even his? Dude should have sued for compensation and moved on. Plenty of matchmakers out there to help him find a new girl. Love ain't that rare.

Gotta say first time I've read an NTR with a realistic ending. Always weird how when the rapists gives evidence of their crimes to the husbands just turns them into cowards that don't do shit and just accept their wives being raped/stolen.
Nice story. Really wish it had better art.
A husband who is not pathetic in an NTR manga? That's impossible.
Now that the best NTR!!! divorce, Karma’s, and happy ending. They need to remastered edition for art 😂😂😂😂🧐
Hmm this is probably one of the ntr that i checked that has an interesting story
Story is great but the art is meehhh
Wth this is not freaking fair!!!, one of the better Ntr i read in a wihile and the art has to be a sketch art.  This needs a remaster edtion lol
@bruhacked Yeah, maybe the author can hire a artist next time *burns*
by Slaanesh this is the best NTR evah~!
Well, at least this one got some decent story worthy of reading.
Not sure what's more disappointing - the lackluster art or the pathetic plot.
Fucking great ending.
@Euphorism then give the compensation money to the author for him to do better

Husband should’ve fused gotten compensation money from the rapists then get compensation money from wife since he was married while she was cheating. If DNA test prove that they are not his child, bro will make a fortune.
bad guy gets punished interesting
pathetic raising another mans child, id toss that slut to the streets with the fucking kids
This is somewhat lacking :(
